newsitems.title: Welcome
newsitems.text: Welcome to [EU] NLFunHouse the server where it is all about fun!

newsitems.title: Rules
newsitems.text: It's very important to have fun in this server! And respect each other.

newsitems.title: Features
newsitems.text: Server Features: Radio, infinite wingsuit, altitude meter & spawn menu's
